title: Your Spouse Should be First
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Thompson
itunes:summary:
Besides your relationship with God, your relationship with your spouse is the most important one. To help illustrate that point, John, Erin and Greg share what it is like when their spouse reaches out to them before other friendships. Featuring Pastor Kevin Thompson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Friends, Partners and Lover" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-30?refcd=1443001

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/your-spouse-should-be-first/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/embracing-your-role-as-a-spouse-digital/?refcd=1443001

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
